Name: Star Age: Space Combat
About the game: In the 23rd century, chaos rules the galactic frontier. Outlaws, rebels, pirates, and more prowl the space lanes, hunted by those who would bring them to justice. In this wild era of human history, are you ready for combat? GET READY TO FLY Pilot a spacecraft with a complete arsenal of weapons. CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS Compete in online multiplayer against your friends…and your enemies. RULE THE FRONTIER Prove that you’re the best pilot the galaxy has ever seen! Star Age: Space Combat is coming to Steam Early Access! This is a work-in-progress build with some fundamental gameplay. More content will be added as the game progresses. The current version of the game has the following features: Go for a test flight in the game's practice mode. Play online using the custom server browser, in both public and private matches. Fire lasers and missiles at your enemies. Additional content, including ship customizations and ranked matchmaking, will be coming in later updates.
